name: Battle Battalions: Infantry Starter Kit
detailed_description:
We've assembled the perfect package to kick start your domination on the battlefield! If you favor units that are fleet of foot, tough to pin down and easy to hide, you'll want to choose the Infantry Starter Kit, which includes:

  • Infantry Battalions Starter Pack (includes the following Battalions: Skirmisher, Hornet, Sniper and Suppressor)
  • 30 Days Premium Account access
  • 500 Gold
